name: Pokémon Dream Radar
overview: Pokemon Dream Radar is a downloadable Nintendo 3DS game that was released on the same date as Pokemon Black 2 and White 2 in all regions. Making use of the augmented reality technology of the 3DS, Pokemon Dream Radar is a shooting game that provides an alternate method for obtaining a particular group of Pokemon with their hidden abilities. This guide provides an overview of how to play the game and what you can gain from playing it.
